IEEE at Cornell Wiki

This wiki covers class information for IEEE-related courses and activities at Cornell University. Our goal is to provide easy access to important resources, course materials, and student guidance. Please help us grow this valuable resource by contributing!

Classes

1000-Level

  • ECE 1210: The Computing Technology Inside Your Smartphone

2000-Level

  • ECE 2720: Data Science for Engineers
  • ECE 2100: Introduction to Circuits for Electrical and Computer Engineers
  • ECE 2300: Digital Logic and Computer Organization

3000-Level

  • ECE 3250: Signals and Systems

4000-Level

  • ECE 4840: Introduction to Controlled Fusion
  • ECE 4760: Digital Systems Design Using Microcontroller
  • ECE 4450: Computer Networks and Telecommunications
  • ECE 4200: Fundamentals of Machine Learning

5000-Level

  • ECE 5810: Introduction to Plasma Physics
  • ECE 5800: Control and Optimization of Information Networks
  • ECE 5775: High-Level Digital Design Automation
  • ECE 5745: Complex Digital ASIC Design
  • ECE 5725: Design with Embedded Operating Systems
  • ECE 5520: Power Systems and Market Operations
  • ECE 5242: Intelligent Autonomous Systems
  • ECE 5110: Random Signals in Communications and Signal Processing
